insert into tbl_recipereply(mno, bno, rno, rrno, seq, content) values (#{mno, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bno, jdbcType=INTEGER}, seq_recipeReply.nextval, #{rrno, jdbcType=INTEGER}, 1, #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
